scripts.prepare-uni:arbitrum-goerli: mustache config/arbitrum-goerli.json subgraph-uni.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/arbitrum-goerli.json ./src/contracts.template.ts > ./src/contracts.ts
